params.name: inputs
params.description: Shape as (batch_size, num_tokens, emb_dim) and dtype as float32 or float64.The sequence length of the input sequence.

params.name: mask
params.description: Shape same as inputs.Its each elements identify whether the corresponding input token is padding or not.If True, not padding token. If False, padding token.Defaults to None.

return.description: Returns tensor summed, the result vector of BagOfEmbedding.Its data type is same as inputs and its shape is [batch_size, emb_dim].
